name: OMSI 2 Add-on Projekt Gladbeck
description: NOTICE: Requires the base game OMSI 2 in order to play. Activation key must be used on a valid Steam account, requires internet connection.   ABOUT THE GAME	   OMSI 2 - Project Gladbeck - The Ruhr region by bus!Hop on and be a bus driver on more than 35 recreated bus lines through cities like Gladbeck, Bottrop, Gelsenkirchen, Essen, Recklinghausen, Marl and Dortmund! HereŽs the deal: 1,000 objects and buildings on 500km of accessible route - guaranteeing more than 2,000 hours of driving fun!A special highlight: It is the biggest map for OMSI 2 with 8 bus stations and 3 depots so far! The highest possible realism is ensured byoriginal timetables and paintworks provided by courtesy of the Vestische Straßenbahnen GmbH. Events such as "Public festivals", "Christmas Markets", AI trains and trams create the perfect ambience for each time and season.OMSI 2 - Project Gladbeck offers players more realism than the previous freeware versions! Monthly updates also ensure a superb variety in your everyday life as driver. The add-on will be compatible with the Advanced Driver Omnibus. 	  KEY FEATURES  More than 35 recreated bus lines of the cities Gladbeck, Bottrop, Gelsenkirchen,  Essen, Recklinghausen, Marl, Dortmund  More than 2.000 hours driving fun  More than 1.000 individual objects and buildings  More than 500km of accessible route  More realism than the previous freeware versions  Monthly updates ensure the prospective possibility of variety  Specials such as Public festivals and Christmas Markets  Express lines  Night bus lines  Parts of the route include the Autobahn  8 bus stations  3 depots  Original timetable data of the Vestische Straßenbahnen GmbH  ÖPNV-line  Announcements  Stadium traffic  Special service (School transport)  Active LIVE-Ticker App in App Store and Amazon  Original paintworks of the Vestische Straßenbahnen GmbH  Movie Park Germany  AI trains  AI trams  New passenger voices  Original tickets of the Vestische Straßenbahnen GmbH   Highlights in this version:  More than 35 accessible bus lines  Striking buildings and places reconstruct realistically  Biggest card for OMSI 2 so far!  Monthly updates improves and expand the version continuously  Compatible with AOD (Advanced Omnibus Driver)  List of functions and contents:  Map with more than 35 accessible bus lines  C2 + C2G busses  Original paintworks of the Vestische Straßenbahnen GmbH  Rolling stock (AI tram + AI trains)  New passenger voicesSYSTEM REQUIREMENTS 	  OMSI 2  The Omnibussimulator min. 2.2.032  Operating system: Win XP/Vista/7/8/8.1/10  Processor: (CPU) 2,8 GHz  RAM: 4 GB or higher  Free hard disk space min: 6 GB  Graphic card min: 1024 MB (DirectX: 9.0 or higher)  Internet connection and user account required for Steam
